item.description: About me I’m Nguyen Khanh Ngoc, my friends usually call me Khanh Ngoc. I got started as a coder on April 2014. I am crazy about coding and so I would never stop building high performance mobile applications for users’s great digital experiences ‚ú® Right now, I’m a mobile applications developer üì≤ I specialize efficient IOS & Android - Top popular mobile platforms. In the following years, I also plan to explore Cross-Platform like React Navive or Flutter and become a better-rounded full-stack mobile dev üí™

Developing VPBank Online application new version, making new greater experiences for VPBank’s customers. 2016 - 1018 Company: Appota Position: IOS team leader.
